betterquesting:10.desc:8:
§6Enderium§r is an alloy that §eisn't made like the others§r we've seen so far, as in order to make it, you need an §6Alloy Smelter§r and need to §amix 3 materials together§r.

To make Enderium, you will need §6Lead Ingot§r (§7Which can be found underground§r), §P§6Platinum Ingot§r (§7Which can be found around §eY: 2§r§7, near §eBedrock§r) and §6Ender Pearl§6§rs (§7Which can be collected by defeating Endermen§r). 

Throw §e3 Lead, 1 Platinum, and 4 Ender Pearls into the Alloy Smelter§r and you will be gifted an §aingot of Enderium§r, which can then be used like any other ingot.
